Authors:
Silvina Soria, Raquel Alonso, Lina Bettucci, Sandra
Lupo
Title:
First report of Teratosphaeria pseudoeucalypti in
Uruguay
Abstract:
Teratosphaeria pseudoeucalypti was found causing leaf
blight disease on Eucalyptus globulus, E. dunnii and E. maidenii in
forestry plantations in Uruguay. The pathogen was identified by
morphological characteristics and sequence analysis of the ITS-2, part
of the Î²T and part of the EF-1Î± DNA.
